text.div:
ContraindicationSeverity

Indicates the potential degree of impact of the identified issue on the patient

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/contraindication-severity, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
high HighIndicates the condition may be life-threatening or has the potential to cause permanent injury
moderate ModerateIndicates the condition may result in noticable adverse adverse consequences but is unlikely to be life-threatening or cause permanent injury
low LowIndicates the condition may result in some adverse consequences but is unlikely to substantially affect the situation of the subjec
